Detailed Description

This is the base class for all ODE geoms (like sphere, box and trimesh).

virtual u32 irr::ode::CIrrOdeGeom::getGeomId ( u32  iNum = 0  )  [virtual]

Get the geom's ODE dGeomID. The parameter is only necessary for static trimeshes which can contain more than one ODE trimesh.

Parameters:
iNum the index of the geom id to return
Returns:
the geom's ODE dGeomID

virtual void irr::ode::CIrrOdeGeom::setPosition ( const vector3df &  newpos  )  [virtual]

the "setPosition" method is overridden to make sure the IrrOdeGeom nodes always have a relative position of (0,0,0)
